name: Burnup Blade (LD39)
description:
It's time to fight! Run as fast as you can to the energy stations to recharge your blade while avoiding and slicing up all those pesky spheroid robots!

Note: This game was created for the Ludum Dare 39 Game Jam. Please rate it here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/burnup-blade
